price: Na wanao fanya juhudi kwa ajili yetu, Sisi tutawaongoa kwenye njia zetu. Na hakika Mwenyezi Mungu yu pamoja na watu wema.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
